findings.rationale: An indefinite term may expose the Receiving Party to perpetual obligations, limiting their ability to use information freely and potentially leading to unintentional breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: The absence of specific procedures for the return of Confidential Information may lead to misunderstandings or improper handling of sensitive information upon termination.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.

findings.rationale: A broad definition can lead to ambiguity about what constitutes confidential information, increasing the risk of unintentional disclosure or misuse.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.
